profile.name: Paul Irish
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Google Chrome, ♥z
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a passion for performance optimization, debugging tools, and generative AI. Proven track record of contributing to open-source projects and maintaining personal projects.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of performance optimization tools for Chrome DevTools
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate debugging tools into Chrome's architecture

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Maintained and contributed to open-source projects, including Lighthouse and NeMo
Developed personal projects, such as Scriberr and soft-navigation-trace-viewer

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of Lighthouse, a widely-used web performance auditing tool
Mentored junior developers and provided guidance on open-source project management
